When there was finally a break in the traffic, he dashed across the street, dodged several cars, before he made it to the other side. Then he walked up to the elderly woman and asked her if she needed help. The woman nodded and indicated that she wanted to get to the other side.

info.brief_description: Kyle gains the ability to grow any high school girls' muscles... With a kiss! FMG Only!
info.description:
Kyle is a high school boy with a fetish for muscle girls. One afternoon, he helps an elderly lady cross the street from school, since he is a Boy Scout. The lady grants him one wish, and Kyle wishes for the ability to manipulate any girl's body he sees before him. She gives him the ability to make any girl's muscles grow as soon as he gives a girl a kiss, no matter where he kisses her. He also has the ability to make any girl age or become younger. He can also manipulate any other attribute of a girl he wants.

Kyle's powers will only work on girls between the ages of 12 and 18. His powers don't work on boys or men.

When Kyle kisses a girl, her muscles will inflate to bodybuilder size. Her muscles will grow repeatedly if he kisses her again.

Kyle is a popular student in school. He is tall and handsome in well-liked. All the girls flirt with him and his popularity only increases when he gains this power.

Kyle is 5 ft 8 inches tall, he is 15 years old, he is a freshman in high school, he has blue eyes and long, straight, black hair. He is funny and a bit of a goofball sometimes. He has several friends who are jocks as well as nerds. He loves video games and he's on the soccer team.

Have fun!
